sentences.sContent: In Thailand, delivery of a botulism antitoxin prevented multiple deaths.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Thailand, delivery of a botulism antitoxin prevented multiple deaths.
sentences.sCn: 在泰国，肉毒抗毒素避免了多起死亡的发生。

sentences.sContent: Although antitoxin for the treatment of botulism is only available in some countries, WHO was able to ensure delivery of antitoxin to Thailand by the morning of 19 March.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although antitoxin for the treatment of botulism is only available in some countries, WHO was able to ensure delivery of antitoxin to Thailand by the morning of 19 March.
sentences.sCn: 虽然只在某些国家可获得治疗肉毒中毒的抗毒素，但是世卫组织能确保到3月19日上午向泰国提供抗毒素。

trans.tranOther: a medicine or substance produced by your body which stops the effects of a poison
